thread.title: Warhol portraits set for up £22 million at auction

title: Warhol portraits set for up £22 million at auction
text:
Warhol portraits set for up £22 million at auction Thursday, March 01, 2018 - 01:17 
Andy Warhol's six boldly-coloured self portraits, painted a year before his death in 1987, are expected to fetch between £16-22 million (USD $22-30 million) at a Christie's auction in London on Tuesday (March 6). Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Andy Warhol's six boldly-coloured self portraits, painted a year before his death in 1987, are expected to fetch between £16-22 million (USD $22-30 million) at a Christie's auction in London on Tuesday (March 6).
